Modernes 5.5-Zimmer-Duplex-Terrassenhaus: Modern 5.5-room duplex terrace house in the most tax-efficient municipality in the canton of Aargau (tax rate 48%) 8966 Oberwil-Lieli
<p>Hochwertig ausgebautes Duplex-Terrass: High-quality duplex terrace house (condominium) approx. 210 sqm living space with large garden, swim spa and whirlpool, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, bright living/dining area, open modern kitchen, 1 double garage, 3 parking spaces, granny flat in the basement with separate entrance, dance/cinema room, bathroom with shower, laundry room
<p>In ländlicher Umgebung über der Nebel:
The idyllic community of Oberwil-Lieli is situated in rural surroundings above the fog line, just 14 km (17 minutes by car) from the city limits of Zurich, 30 km from Zug and 26 km from Zurich Airport. A bus stop in front of the house takes you to Zurich Enge in just 20 minutes by express bus without stopping.

At the beginning of a dead-end street, in a sunny location, you can enjoy marvelous sunsets in the large garden with plenty of privacy.

There are numerous leisure activities in the neighborhood: Football pitch, handball court, basketball court, skate park, beach volleyball court and a large climbing tower with a slide.

The primary school and kindergarten are just 230 meters away.

The grocery store Volg and organic farms are in the immediate vicinity.
